history.proof: intros. unfold ex_lim, is_lim. hauto l: on depth: 3use: is_lim_ext_loc, ex_lim, is_lim.

exceptions.tactic: intros g f x H1 H2.
intros g' f x H1 H2.
intros g' f' x H1 H2.
intros g' f' x' H1 H2.

original: intros g f x H1 H2. unfold ex_lim, is_lim in H1. unfold ex_lim, is_lim. intros [l H3]. exists l. apply (is_lim_ext_loc f g x l H1 H2) in H3. apply H3.
